Articles.Content:
Say I take 4 contracts which will pay x amount in total, if I hit all objectives.

When I build my spaceship, I know what I've spent on it, but I don't see any way to check what you stand to make from a mission without jumping into the command center and adding it up yourself. Am I missing something?
This is one area of the UI that I wish had more info handy. For now, you'll have to keep track by writing it down somewhere.

This is one area of the UI that I wish had more info handy. For now, you'll have to keep track by writing it down somewhere.

Huh. Well that's not a big deal. Can we get this moved to suggestions?

I was looking for the same thing. I wanted to keep the cost of my craft under the money I would be making off the contract, but you can't see that in the VAB. The only thing you can do is go back out to the mission control and click on the active contracts tab.

Moved to Gameplay Questions for now.

If someone wants to start a thread discussing UI changes, we have a Suggestions and Development Discussion forum for the purpose.

...Carry on!
